alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:34PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Decatur County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1034 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Dresden, or 9 miles south of Oberlin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dresden around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Jennings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
